Nwoke (asụsụ Inglish boy or child): Na asusu Igbo, 'o' buru na 'vowelu' abua abiakota onu na otu mkpuru okwu, otu n'ime ha na 'elo' nke ozo
Ya mere na mgbe ana ede Nwoke (Nwa+oke), 'O' na elo 'A'..
Nwoke bu isi nwa n'ala Igbo
N'oge gbuo, um  u nwoke na enwe ihe n'ile Nna ha kpatara na ndu ya.

Nwoke = male child.
Nwoke = Nwa + Oke
Nwa = a child
Oke = Male
